important_turns.user_message: I have to take the initiative and provide my mom's requirements now to get the help I need.
important_turns.reason: User expressed frustration and took initiative, indicating dissatisfaction with the assistance provided.

context_before: User: I will outline my mom's features and budget now to finally get the support I need.
context_after: User: I will now detail my momâ€™s features and budget clearly to finally get the assistance needed.
detailed_findings.analysis: The user repeatedly attempted to communicate their needs but did not receive adequate guidance, leading to a decrease in satisfaction.
detailed_findings.recommendation: The assistant should proactively ask clarifying questions and provide structured guidance to help the user articulate their needs effectively.

contextual_notes: The user consistently expressed a need to clarify their requirements, indicating a lack of effective communication from the assistant.
The conversation suggests the user was seeking specific guidance on phone features and budget, which was not adequately addressed.
general_insights: Assistants should actively engage users by asking clarifying questions to ensure understanding of their needs.
Providing structured guidance and suggestions can help users articulate their requirements more effectively.
Monitoring user satisfaction trends can help identify when intervention is needed to prevent dissatisfaction.
